Validation.review-form-id-positive: Movie ID must be a positive number.
Validation.signup-form-username-length: Username must be at least 3 characters long

Validation.signup-form-email-length: Email must be at least 1 character long
Validation.signup-form-password-length: Password must be at least 8 characters long

Validation.signup-form-password-number: Password must contain at least 1 number.
Validation.group-edit-name-string: Group name must be a string
Validation.group-edit-name-length: Group name must be at least 3 characters long
Validation.group-edit-description-string: Group description must be a string
Validation.comment-form-content-string: Comment content must be a string
Validation.comment-form-content-length: Comment content must not be empty
Validation.movie-edit-name-string: Movie name must be a string
Validation.movie-edit-name-length: Movie name must be at least 1 character long

Validation.movie-edit-synopsis-length: Movie synopsis must be at least 1 character long
Validation.movie-edit-genre-string: Movie genre must be a string
Validation.movie-edit-genre-length: Movie genre must be at least 1 character long
Validation.movie-edit-date-format: Release date must be a valid date
Validation.movie-edit-length-number: Movie length must be a number
Validation.movie-edit-length-int: Movie length must be an integer
Validation.movie-edit-length-positive: Movie length must be a positive number
Validation.movie-edit-score-number: Movie score must be a number
